metadata.title: CVE-2023-6040 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An out-of-bounds access vulnerability involving netfilter was reported andfixed as: f1082dd31fe4 (netfilter: nf_tables: Reject tables of unsupportedfamily); While creating a new netfilter table, lack of a safeguard againstinvalid nf_tables family (pf) values within `nf_tables_newtable` functionenables an attacker to achieve out-of-bounds access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-6040` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-92-generic - 5.15.0-92.102
linux-image-5.15.0-92-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-92.102
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-92-generic - 5.15.0-92.102
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-92-generic-64k - 5.15.0-92.102
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1049-kvm - 5.15.0-1049.54
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1052-aws - 5.15.0-1052.57
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1054-azure - 5.15.0-1054.62
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1054-azure-fde - 5.15.0-1054.62.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1049-gcp - 5.15.0-1049.57
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1049-gke - 5.15.0-1049.54
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1035-gkeop - 5.15.0-1035.41
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1045-ibm - 5.15.0-1045.48
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1043-nvidia - 5.15.0-1043.43
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1043-nvidia-lowlatency - 5.15.0-1043.43
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-1045-raspi - 5.15.0-1045.48
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-92.102').
linux-hwe-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.2').
